name: The Creature (Xonha)
description:
*Attention: sound on

This game is made for Weekly Game Jam 144 - my first Game Jam ever.

It is 3am.

You just came back from night work. Suddenly crashing noises appear, a pair of glowing eyes in the middle of your room, looking cautiously at you.

How should you investigate this? Can you identify this creature?

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move

E to interact

*All assets and codes are made during the jam.
